Web Manifesto

2013-08-07

  1. Love thy neighbor. That means everybody.
  2. Open-source everything creative.
  3. Teach metacognition and metaconsciousness.
  4. Combine all teh ideas.
  5. Dance / sing / code / cook / paint / create together.
  6. Disrupt disruption.
  7. Dismantle anything too big.
  8. Hackstability.
  9. Dream bigger. Focus attention upwards and outwards.
  10. Pull requests accepted.
